column1: Baby Barnaby's////This time I had Apple pecan pancakes and although I've had better
column2: they were still pretty good.My only complaint about the pancakes is that they were a little too thick for my liking... but hey
column3: that's OK. I also had their delicious orange juice and found out that you actually get a refill on that microscopic glass! The only thing is that you have to ask for it! So
column4: ask away! I also had a side order of their potatoes
column5: and I just can't get enough of them!! Â My favorite dish is still the green eggs though! Service was good although they were super busy. I will continue to frequent Baby Barnaby's
column6: they've become one of my favorite breakfast spots in Houston! =)
